document_data.mainbody:
A potion of clairaudience was a potion capable of greatly increasing the imbibers hearing.
When consumed this potion increased the imbibers hearing as per the clairaudience spell. The potion also allowed the imbiber to hear within unknown areas up to  distant. These effects lasted for twenty minutes.
* The Diviners Guild of Ravens Bluff was known to sell potions of clairaudience for around 375 gp in the 14 century DR.
Ardasir al-Darah, of the Jann of the Haunted Lands, carried a potion of clairaudience.
